ðŸ“– Summary: Securade.ai HUB is an edge platform that leverages generative AI to enhance existing CCTV cameras with computer vision capabilities. It enables real-time detection of safety and security incidents, including PPE compliance, proximity alerts, and exclusion zone monitoring. The platform offers a zero-shot learning approach, eliminating the need for manual data labeling, and provides an analytics dashboard for real-time safety metrics.
